ygData.msgSnippet: Motormaster looked over the hill, and saw Shockwave fighting Incinerator. There is our target he said, pointing to Incinerator, and refering to any

Subject: Re: Decepticon vs Decepticon

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster looked over the hill, and saw Shockwave fighting
Incinerator. "There is our target" he said, pointing to Incinerator, and
refering to any Decepticons not busy. He then raised his Cyclone gun,
and took aim, perching it on his shoulder, then fired twice on
Incinerator.

Speedbreaker followed, climbing up beside him, and perching firing his
breakdown gun four times at Incinerator. 

Wildrider just peeled out of the forest, and came to a stop, knocking
Symphony off. He had heard the orders over radio link. "Okay recruit,
show us what you got," He said, pointing at Incinerator. Wildrider on
the other hand didnt have patience for that. He took aim on a bigger
target, and found one. He pulled his trigger laughing, firring a
scattering eight laser beams at Lavatron, not caring if any by mistake
hit Surgital.
